name: app_id
body: The ID of the app that created the order.

name: billing_address
body: The mailing address associated with the payment method. This address is an optional field that won't be available on orders that do not require a payment method. It has the following properties:

name: browser_ip
body: The IP address of the browser used by the customer when they placed the order. Both IPv4 and IPv6 are supported.

name: buyer_accepts_marketing
body: Whether the customer consented to receive email updates from the shop.

name: cancel_reason
body: The reason why the order was canceled. Valid values:

name: cancelled_at
body: The date and time when the order was canceled. Returns null if the order isn't canceled.

name: cart_token
body: A unique value when referencing the cart that's associated with the order.

name: checkout_token
body: A unique value when referencing the checkout that's associated with the order.

name: client_details
body: Information about the browser that the customer used when they placed their order:

name: closed_at
body: The date and time (ISO 8601 format) when the order was closed. Returns null if the order isn't closed.

name: created_at
body: The autogenerated date and time (ISO 8601 format) when the order was created in Shopify. The value for this property cannot be changed.

name: currency
body: The three-letter code (ISO 4217 format) for the shop currency.

name: current_total_discounts
body: The current total discounts on the order in the shop currency. The value of this field reflects order edits, returns, and refunds.

name: current_total_discounts_set
body: The current total discounts on the order in shop and presentment currencies. The amount values associated with this field reflect order edits, returns, and refunds.

name: current_total_duties_set
body: The current total duties charged on the order in shop and presentment currencies. The amount values associated with this field reflect order edits, returns, and refunds.

name: current_total_price
body: The current total price of the order in the shop currency. The value of this field reflects order edits, returns, and refunds.

name: current_total_price_set
body: The current total price of the order in shop and presentment currencies. The amount values associated with this field reflect order edits, returns, and refunds.

name: current_subtotal_price
body: The current subtotal price of the order in the shop currency. The value of this field reflects order edits, returns, and refunds.

name: current_subtotal_price_set
body: The current subtotal price of the order in shop and presentment currencies. The amount values associated with this field reflect order edits, returns, and refunds.

name: current_total_tax
body: The current total taxes charged on the order in the shop currency. The value of this field reflects order edits, returns, or refunds.

name: current_total_tax_set
body: The current total taxes charged on the order in shop and presentment currencies. The amount values associated with this field reflect order edits, returns, and refunds.

name: customer
body: Information about the customer. The order might not have a customer and apps should not depend on the existence of a customer object. This value might be null if the order was created through Shopify POS. For more information about the customer object, see the Customer resource.

name: customer_locale
body: The two or three-letter language code, optionally followed by a region modifier.

name: discount_applications
body: An ordered list of stacked discount applications. The discount_applications property includes 3 types: discount_code, manual, and script. All 3 types share a common structure and have some type specific attributes.

name: discount_codes
body: A list of discounts applied to the order. Each discount object includes the following properties:

name: email
body: The customer's email address.

name: estimated_taxes
body: Whether taxes on the order are estimated. Many factors can change between the time a customer places an order and the time the order is shipped, which could affect the calculation of taxes. This property returns false when taxes on the order are finalized and aren't subject to any changes.

name: financial_status
body: The status of payments associated with the order. Can only be set when the order is created. Valid values:

name: fulfillments
body: An array of fulfillments associated with the order. For more information, see the Fulfillment API.

name: fulfillment_status
body: The order's status in terms of fulfilled line items. Valid values:

name: gateway
body: The payment gateway used.

name: id
body: The ID of the order, used for API purposes. This is different from the order_number property, which is the ID used by the shop owner and customer.'

name: landing_site
body: The URL for the page where the buyer landed when they entered the shop.

name: line_items
body: A list of line item objects, each containing information about an item in the order. Each object has the following properties:

name: location_id
body: The ID of the physical location where the order was processed. If you need to reference the location against an order, then use the FulfillmentOrder resource.

name: name
body: The order name, generated by combining the order_number property with the order prefix and suffix that are set in the merchant's general settings. This is different from the id property, which is the ID of the order used by the API. This field can also be set by the API to be any string value.

name: note
body: An optional note that a shop owner can attach to the order.

name: note_attributes
body: Extra information that is added to the order. Appears in the Additional details section of an order details page. Each array entry must contain a hash with name and value keys.

name: number
body: The order's position in the shop's count of orders. Numbers are sequential and start at 1.

name: order_number
body: The order 's position in the shop's count of orders starting at 1001. Order numbers are sequential and start at 1001.

name: original_total_duties_set
body: The original total duties charged on the order in shop and presentment currencies.

name: payment_details
body: An object containing information about the payment. It has the following properties:

name: payment_terms
body: The terms and conditions under which a payment should be processed.

name: payment_gateway_names
body: The list of payment gateways used for the order.

name: phone
body: The customer's phone number for receiving SMS notifications.

name: presentment_currency
body: The presentment currency that was used to display prices to the customer.

name: processed_at
body: The date and time (ISO 8601 format) when an order was processed. This value is the date that appears on your orders and that's used in the analytic reports. If you're importing orders from an app or another platform, then you can set processed_at to a date and time in the past to match when the original order was created.

name: processing_method
body: How the payment was processed. It has the following valid values:

name: referring_site
body: The website where the customer clicked a link to the shop.

name: refunds
body: A list of refunds applied to the order. For more information, see the Refund API.

name: shipping_address
body: The mailing address to where the order will be shipped. This address is optional and will not be available on orders that do not require shipping. It has the following properties:

name: shipping_lines
body: An array of objects, each of which details a shipping method used. Each object has the following properties:

name: source_name
body: Where the order originated. Can be set only during order creation, and is not writeable afterwards. Values for Shopify channels are protected and cannot be assigned by other API clients: web, pos, shopify_draft_order, iphone, and android. Orders created via the API can be assigned any other string of your choice. If unspecified, then new orders are assigned the value of your app's ID.

name: subtotal_price
body: The price of the order in the shop currency after discounts but before shipping, duties, taxes, and tips.

name: subtotal_price_set
body: The subtotal of the order in shop and presentment currencies after discounts but before shipping, duties, taxes, and tips.

name: tags
body: Tags attached to the order, formatted as a string of comma-separated values. Tags are additional short descriptors, commonly used for filtering and searching. Each individual tag is limited to 40 characters in length.

name: tax_lines
body: An array of tax line objects, each of which details a tax applicable to the order. Each object has the following properties:

name: taxes_included
body: Whether taxes are included in the order subtotal.

name: test
body: Whether this is a test order.

name: token
body: A unique value when referencing the order.

name: total_discounts
body: The total discounts applied to the price of the order in the shop currency.

name: total_discounts_set
body: The total discounts applied to the price of the order in shop and presentment currencies.

name: total_line_items_price
body: The sum of all line item prices in the shop currency.

name: total_line_items_price_set
body: The total of all line item prices in shop and presentment currencies.

name: total_outstanding
body: The total outstanding amount of the order in the shop currency.

name: total_price
body: The sum of all line item prices, discounts, shipping, taxes, and tips in the shop currency. Must be positive.

name: total_price_set
body: The total price of the order in shop and presentment currencies.

name: total_shipping_price_set
body: The total shipping price of the order, excluding discounts and returns, in shop and presentment currencies. If taxes_included is set to true, then total_shipping_price_set includes taxes.

name: total_tax
body: The sum of all the taxes applied to the order in the shop currency. Must be positive.

name: total_tax_set
body: The total tax applied to the order in shop and presentment currencies.

name: total_tip_received
body: The sum of all the tips in the order in the shop currency.

name: total_weight
body: The sum of all line item weights in grams. The sum is not adjusted as items are removed from the order.

name: updated_at
body: The date and time (ISO 8601 format) when the order was last modified. Filtering orders by updated_at is not an effective method for fetching orders because its value can change when no visible fields of an order have been updated. Use the Webhook and Event APIs to subscribe to order events instead.

name: user_id
body: The ID of the user logged into Shopify POS who processed the order, if applicable.

name: order_status_url
body: The URL pointing to the order status web page, if applicable.
